sourceDesc.p: Examples selected from the transcribed volumes of the IsisCB

encodingDesc.p: Examples (test cases) are drawn from the transcribed bibliographies of the IsisCB volumes.

Each distinct example is enclosed in a div element, whose children are a sequence of p elements which contain one or more bibliographic citations. After the p elements should follow a sequence of one or more bibl elements containing a marked up version of the original paragraphs.
The text within the bibl elements should exactly match the text content of the corresponding preceding paragraphs (i.e. text, other than white space, should nto be added or removed).
